about_the_game:
Eberouge Character Pack 1 contains facesets, bust images and walking sprites of the original beloved characters. Now it's up to you to decide just what role they're going to play! Inspired by 1990's Japanese manga with an anime aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources.

Features:

* 20 characters with outfit options for some characters, for a total of 44 walking sprites
* 20 character facesets with outfit options for some characters and 3 to 8 emotions per character, for a total of 192 images
* 19 character portrait bust images, 3 to 21 busts per character with emotions, and whole body images for some characters, for a total of 239 images
* 67 icons for items (magic items like crystal gems, rings and books etc., flashlight, flowers and more!)
* 12 zodiac icons
detailed_description:
Eberouge Character Pack 1 contains facesets, bust images and walking sprites of the original beloved characters. Now it's up to you to decide just what role they're going to play! Inspired by 1990's Japanese manga with an anime aesthetic, the characters in this pack are a fantastic addition to your growing library of creative resources.

Features:

* 20 characters with outfit options for some characters, for a total of 44 walking sprites
* 20 character facesets with outfit options for some characters and 3 to 8 emotions per character, for a total of 192 images
* 19 character portrait bust images, 3 to 21 busts per character with emotions, and whole body images for some characters, for a total of 239 images
* 67 icons for items (magic items like crystal gems, rings and books etc., flashlight, flowers and more!)
* 12 zodiac icons

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

Minimum:

  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU

  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Fans of Eberouge rejoice! Now you can use original characters from the popular 90s Japanese dating simulation game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
